location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to W. C Bruce, General Paymaster at Bombay, from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf

physicalDescription.extent: The letter has been struck out in pencil.

mods.abstract: The letter is a covering letter, the original of which enclosed bills of exchange (not included in the file) for the General Paymaster, on account of remittances made for the salaries of the staff of the Residency. The bills cover the period 30 April 1824 to 31 January 1825.
